title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 23 March 2009 - XWiki
content:

ancutagheorghe - (23/03/2009 18:29): nothing detalied  
sdumitriu - (23/03/2009 18:30): Can you try from scratch?  
sdumitriu - (23/03/2009 18:30): Download http://forge.objectweb.org/project/download.php?group\_id=170&file\_id=12522  
sdumitriu - (23/03/2009 18:30): Unzip  
ancutagheorghe - (23/03/2009 18:30): yes this is what i want too do tonight and tomorrow i will tell you what happend  
sdumitriu - (23/03/2009 18:31): Copy the webapps/xwiki directory to tomact/webapps  
sdumitriu - (23/03/2009 18:31): Start tomcat  
sdumitriu - (23/03/2009 18:31): It should work  
ancutagheorghe - (23/03/2009 18:31): so you said that i can remove tld files  
ancutagheorghe - (23/03/2009 18:31): if i still have problems with them  
sdumitriu - (23/03/2009 18:31): You can, but normally you shouldn't  
sdumitriu - (23/03/2009 18:31): Nobody had problems with those before  
ancutagheorghe - (23/03/2009 18:31): if you will still be around in few minutes  
ancutagheorghe - (23/03/2009 18:31): i will tell you what happend  
aks10 - (23/03/2009 18:39): Hello Sir, I am Akshay Mittal from IIT Kanpur,India. I would like to gather some information regarding a project.  
ancutagheorghe - (23/03/2009 19:58): here
